column4: How did you check that the user list was removed without logging out?
I haven't logged out yet, I simply disabled the user list for the gdm screen
Ok, I see, just trusting the command did its job.
I did it from the gconf-editor
Oh, I decided to ditch the list too, I followed the terminal command using gconftool in the link somebody sent you earlier.
the setting to remove the user list in gconf-editor doesn't work. must be left-over from Jaunty and someone forgot to remove the setting
